item.description:
Middleborough, Massachusetts recently instituted a ban on cursing in public areas, imposing a $20 fine on anyone caught guilty of such an offense. This is obviously FUCKING BULLSHIT, and unconstitutional as well!

Adam Kokesh will be on his way back from Porcfest in NH and has decided to stop in Mass. He is is putting the call out for a large civil disobedience protest on Monday, June 25th from 12:30-1:00pm. Bring your bullhorn and foulest vocabulary to the Town Hall at 10 Nickerson Avenue, Middleborough MA 02346 and engage in the most profane conversation possible with your fellow liberty lovers. Let's show these uptight assholes what freedom of fucking speech is all about!

For the full story about this dumbfuckery, check out the AP news report:

http://www.google.com/hostednews/ap/article/ALeqM5hE6ChsCknFXM27rDtSPlrOCKYHRg?docId=3aa26e3fc25a4f7dace15d024de4b0c5

More info on event here: https://www.facebook.com/events/313738022047006/
item.name: Free F*cking Speech Demonstration w. Adam Kokesh in Middleboro, MA
